children.name: file-drop-file-analysis-reporting @file-drop-file-analysis-reporting
I can download the full XML analysis report for a file {"supportedFile":"src/data/input/file1.docx","xmlFile":"file1.xml"} @smoke @TEST-225
I can download the full PDF analysis report for a file {"supportedFile":"src/data/input/file2.pdf","pdfFile":"file2.pdf"} @smoke @TEST-226
request-history-filtering-by-risk-outcome @request-history-filtering-by-risk-outcome
I can filter the log by file risks {"filter":"Safe","filteredFile":"Safe"} @functional @smoke @TEST-164
file-drop-file-process-result-view @file-drop-file-process-result-view
I can download the full analysis report of a processed file {"supportedFile":"src/data/input/issues.docx","analysisReport":"issues.docx.xml"} @smoke @TEST-227

I can see the result of a repaired file with the issues removed {"activeContentFile":"src/data/input/file1.docx","activeContent":"Internal Hyperlinks present in CT_Bookmark","repairedObject":"APP segment removed","processStatus":"Your file has been processed"} @smoke @TEST-228

I can see the result of a unrepaired file with the list of structural issues not removed {"fileWithIssues":"src/data/input/file2.pdf","nonrepairedObject":"Non-conforming image","processStatus":"Your file has been processed"} @smoke @TEST-229

Content Management Policy Editing @content-management-policy-editing

A user can cancel any updates that they have done to the policy by pressing cancel {"FileType":"word","ContentFlags":"embeddedFiles","CurrentFlagType":"disallow","ChangedFlagType":"sanitise"} @functional @smoke @TEST-188
I can edit policy content flags {"FileType":"word","ContentFlags":"embeddedFiles","FlagType":"sanitise"} @functional @smoke @TEST-155
I can edit policy content flags {"FileType":"excel","ContentFlags":"externalHyperlinks","FlagType":"disallow"} @functional @smoke @TEST-155
A user is able to change all content flags for all file type in policy page {"FileType":"word","FlagType":"sanitise"} @functional @smoke @TEST-Change-all-content-flag-for-all-doc-type
A user is able to change all content flags for all file type in policy page {"FileType":"pdf","FlagType":"disallow"} @functional @smoke @TEST-Change-all-content-flag-for-all-doc-type

request-history-log @request-history-log
I am able to change the number of files displayed on the page {"itemCount":"25","fileCount":"4"} @smoke @TEST-166

I can remove individual filters {"filterOne":"png","filterTwo":"Safe","filterToRemove":"Safe","appliedFilter":"Png"} @functional @smoke @TEST-189
file-drop-file-processing @file-drop-file-processing

I can process a file through the file drop service {"supportedFile":"src/data/input/issues.docx","fileName":"issues.docx","fileType":"docx","processStatus":"Your file has been processed"} @smoke @TEST-230

I can process a file through the file drop service {"supportedFile":"src/data/input/structuralIssues.xlsx","fileName":"structuralIssues.xlsx","fileType":"xlsx","processStatus":"Your file has been processed"} @smoke @TEST-230
An error message is produced when file drop is unable to process a file {"file":"src/data/input/icaptest.ps1","error":"Please use a supported file type"} @smoke @TEST-231

An error message is produced when file drop is unable to process a file {"file":"src/data/input/test2.pdf","error":"This free service is currently limited to a maximum file size of 3.5MB"} @smoke @TEST-231
